topics.body:
Standard infantry squad consist of 8 squad members.
Which include:
-Team leader (usually a sergeant, lieutenant or captain)
-Field medic
-Heavy gunner
-Designated marksman
-Combat engineer(optional depending on mission)
-other regular riflemen

This configuration versatile enough to take on any mission.

But there had only been one game that scared me so much that it gave me nightmares for a long time.

Can't remember what it was but it was a point-and-click game. I played it with my friends.
